bug.author: George3d6
bug.description: From a Debian Stretch latest Linux excalibur 4.9.0-8-amd64 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/issues/1>#1</denchmark-link> SMP Debian 4.9.144-3.1 (2019-02-19) x86_64 GNU/Linux Python 3.5.3 (default, Sep 27 2018, 17:25:39) [GCC 6.3.0 20170516] on linux As root and as user: pip3 install mindsdb 'Killed' From the fresh AWS Windows Server 2019 Python 3.7.3 (v3.7.3:ef4ec6ed12, Mar 25 2019, 21:26:53) [MSC v.1916 32 bit (Intel)] Collecting tensorflow==1.13.1 (from mindsdb) Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement tensorflow==1.13.1 (from mindsdb) (from versions: ) No matching distribution found for tensorflow==1.13.1 (from mindsdb)

comments.comment: Never got to do this, install processed changed a lot now so I don't think this is still relevant.
